name: Electronic Signature
short_description: Cloud-based electronic signature platforms offer a security net that desktop software and internal servers cannot match. The business-critical, executed documents that users archive in web-based e-signature systems are stored on remote servers with sophisticated security protocols, backups, and redundancy. This ensures documents remain accessible for future inquiries or disputes, since world-class cloud storage is not subject to the vulnerabilities of local data storage.
summary: E-signatures are just beginning to achieve widespread adoption.
